scripts.tailwind-build: cross-env NODE_ENV=development TAILWIND_MODE=build postcss tailwind/tailwind.css -o public/tailwind.css
scripts.tailwind-watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development TAILWIND_MODE=watch postcss tailwind/tailwind.css -o public/tailwind.css -w
scripts.tailwind-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production TAILWIND_MODE=build postcss tailwind/tailwind.css -o public/tailwind.css
scripts.prod-build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production TAILWIND_MODE=build postcss tailwind/tailwind.css -o public/tailwind.css && zola build
